content.prompt: The Portuguese exploration referred to in the passage was most directly enabled by which of the following?

choices.label: Military tactics relying on the use of heavily armed cavalry troops
The use of printing presses to spread new religious ideas
Joint-stock companies and other methods of securing private funding for trade voyages
Navigational knowledge of Indian Ocean currents and wind patterns

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
